name: Timothy J. SAVAGE, Patrick J. Mellody, George E. James and James Kirchner, Appellees, v. Governor Thomas J. RIDGE, Pennsylvania Liquor Control Board, John E. Jones, III, in both his Official and Individual Capacities, and Robert Fohl, in both his Official and Individual Capacities, Appellants
docket_number: Appeal No. 71 Middle District Appeal Docket 1997

parties: Timothy J. SAVAGE, Patrick J. Mellody, George E. James and James Kirchner, Appellees, v. Governor Thomas J. RIDGE, Pennsylvania Liquor Control Board, John E. Jones, III, in both his Official and Individual Capacities, and Robert Fohl, in both his Official and Individual Capacities, Appellants.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th day of June, 1998, the orders of the Commonwealth Court are hereby affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
711 A.2d 473
Timothy J. SAVAGE, Patrick J. Mellody, George E. James and James Kirchner, Appellees, v. Governor Thomas J. RIDGE, Pennsylvania Liquor Control Board, John E. Jones, III, in both his Official and Individual Capacities, and Robert Fohl, in both his Official and Individual Capacities, Appellants.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 25, 1998.
